message:
「台灣關係法」是美國國內法，向白宮請願，是抵擋比中共導彈更可怕的「兩岸服貿協議」(Trade Agreement Between Taiwan and China)的最有效途徑。

10萬人連署募集倒數最後幾千人，請大家前往連署。
story: Jimmy Chen shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: President Ma is trying to ignore normal review procedure and enforce to pass the trade agreement between Taiwan and China without any line-by-line review. This agreement will only benefit the China economy. Moreover, Taiwan will be invaded gradually:Taiwanese democracy will erode by Chinese dictator...
name: Oppose Trade Agreement Between Taiwan and China | We the People: Your Voice in Our Government
caption: petitions.whitehouse.gov

data.message: 這連署跟台灣關係法有啥關係？且目前是差八萬多票...
自助而後人助之，我們得想辦法自己先站起來，外來的協助只能期待無法強求
不用期待美國~~國際關係中對他們國家有利益的事 他們會不請自來!! 沒好處的事,你拜託他都不鳥你
